name: JOHAN SCHOTTE FOUNDATION
membership: We are a member of and country station of SS-GATE, a Global Project of UNDP.
memberOrga: We are not a Membership organization
goal: The mission of the JOHAN SCHOTTE FOUNDATION is to contribute to a lasting measurable impact in improving the human condition on the planet by fostering peace through education and innovation.
interests: Education and training, Justice and Fundamental Rights
euInitiatives: Human Rights with a main focus on Women's rights and Education
